name: ShroomWars
description:
Fight your friends in this 2-player, local PVP game.


Created with Mihail Kounelakis for the following game jam: https://itch.io/jam/mushroom-jam-2022

Thank you to Mihail Kounelakis for the mushroom characters, mushroom props, explosion animation, cover art, and background music!

All sound effects come from Taira Komori.

The note music icon comes from IconFinder.

Code: https://github.com/o-l-i-v-e-s/mushroom-game-jam
